articles.content: The United States is currently experiencing a surge in COVID-19 cases as states begin dropping restrictions and allowing businesses to open once again. With people venturing outside and returning to … [+2325 chars]

articles.author: Manuel Flores
articles.title: Enter to win wireless earbuds with CNET's Apple Core Sweepstakes* - CNET
articles.description: Two lucky winners will each win a pair of Apple AirPods Pro. Giveaway ends June 30. *Open to the US, Puerto Rico and Canada (excluding Quebec).
articles.content: We're celebrating the start of WWDC 2020 Monday by giving away a pair of Apple AirPod Pro earbuds to two grand prize winners! Apple's AirPods Pro have a compact, lightweight, noise-canceling and swea… [+602 chars]
